name: HarfangLab
description: This plugin is used to share indicators of type MD5, SHA256 and URLs (IPv4, IPv6, Domains, URLs) to IOC List (Threat Intelligence > IOC List) on HarfangLab. This plugin does not support pulling of indicators.

configuration.label: Tenant URL
configuration.description: Tenant URL of your HarfangLab platform.

configuration.label: API Token
configuration.description: API Token of your user available from Administration > Users.
